meanings.definition: A group or set of seven things.
meanings.sent1: The heptad of colorful pencils stood out in the box.
meanings.sent2: She organized the heptad of books on the shelf by genre.
meanings.sent3: The heptad of kittens played together in the yard, creating a cute chaos.
meanings.sent4: The heptad of stars in the sky shone brightly on the clear night.
meanings.sent5: The heptad of musical notes formed a harmonious melody.

meanings.sent1: The heptad of school days seemed to drag on forever.
meanings.sent2: They planned a heptad of activities for their vacation.
meanings.sent3: The heptad of rainy days made staying indoors cozy and relaxing.
meanings.sent4: The heptad of sunrises marked the passing of time in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The heptad of workdays flew by quickly with the team's efficiency.
